attributes.action: Give the hospitality industry financial support! Save our pubs!
attributes.additional_details: The hospitality sector has had the highest level of ‘rules and standards’ to follow out of all sectors. Yet is still being victimised. My family have spend a lot of money to assure their pub is the highest standard of ‘covid 19 safety’. Having ALL of our customers and beer company reps tell us how safe the pub is. But then why are supermarkets, carpet shops etc allowed to open with nothing in place and people walk around with no masks on....and still pubs can’t open! It’s disgraceful!
attributes.background: Financially support pubs, bars and the rest of the hospitality industry for not being able to open or run at full capacity.

rejection.details:
'Give further financial support to the Events and Hospitality industry' 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329985

'Don't shut pubs again due to Covid-19' 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334036

'Save our hospitality industry. Allow all pubs to open on Tier one rules.'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561716
